segments.text: Wow ! It's hot today ! Do you want to get an ice cream cone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No Let's go to an ice cream parlor ! They have way more flavors to choose from there . I feel like having something special like Neapolitan ice cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's three different flavors mixed together . Chocolate , strawberry and something green with candied fruit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do they have ice cream bars . frozen yogurt or frozen chocolate mousse ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely ! They also have real Italian Galatian and French sorbets . They do a great baked Alaska .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe a vanilla ice cream milkshake would be good . What's your favorite flavor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well ... l like the traditional flavors like rum raisin , butter pecan . maple walnut , strawberry , chocolate and vanilla . But now there are some new flavors from Asia like green tea and durian .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: God ! Even talking about it makes me feel like l'm gaining weight !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's OK . We can go jogging , after we eat !
segments.speaker: S2
